overview: Middle-aged Napa Valley grape-grower Tony posts a marriage proposal to San Francisco waitress Lena enclosing a photo of his handsome younger brother Buck. When she gets there she overlooks his duplicity and marries him. Then she falls in love with Buck.
tagline: Hungry for Love!-Starved for love- then Fate held out happiness for her- and snatched it away.
title: A Lady to Love
